### Tender Description

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada seeks a Contractor to provide actuarial consulting services for the annual audit of Export Development Canada. The Contractor will review the work of EDC Actuaries to assess the reasonableness of the estimates, methodology, and assumptions in valuing the premium and claims liabilities, including reinsurance-related assets and liabilities, in accordance with Canadian Auditing Standard (CAS) 620. The Contractor will provide assurance that these liabilities and disclosures are reasonable and in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) and the Canadian Institute of Actuaries' Standards.

This requirement is expected to result in the award of one (1) contract. The Contractor must have experience providing actuarial consulting services, specifically in valuing premium and claims liabilities and reinsurance-related assets and liabilities.
